Package de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks

Class ChunkManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.ChunkManager
public class ChunkManager
extends java.lang.Object
The ChunkManager is used to manage a chunkArray which represents the Field of ChunkIDObjects around the camera. This array is permanently updated and used to request the needed Chunks from the ChunkStoage.

The size of this array can be set in Configuration and is equal to CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE + 2*CHUNK_ARRAY_BUFFERFRAME_SIZE

The managed renderArray fetches the corresponding finished Chunks that are represented by the ChunkIDObjects in the chunkArray in each update. The Chunks in this array that are not visible are reduced as far as possible, before it is used for rendering the world.

Author:
Tobias Mueller

    • checkActiveChunkArray

      private Vector3i checkActiveChunkArray​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f camPos)
      checks if the chunkarray needs to be updated and does so if needed
      Parameters:
      camPos - newest position of the Camera
      Returns:
      null if no update is needed, else returns the delta of the direction in which the array has to be updated
